resources.string: THANK-YOU For Joining To Our Community

1.Your account and details will get verified by the administer.

2.We will get you in touch 2-3 days please check your emails.

 3.After the verification is done We will send you a code in your email that will be used for your login.

4.Please Verify Your Email Address by Log-In to your Official-account.

5.Next click On Existing-seller to Access your My-FOOD Profile

6.Contact number admin-8471984341,Email- islammushtaq@gmail.com
